text:
Hey guys, just created a new app using Ember Cli v1.13.15 - but now get this error.. any ideas? 

line 1, col 1, 'import' is only available in ES6 (use 'esversion: 6').
line 3, col 1, 'export' is only available in ES6 (use 'esversion: 6')
right. I can’t even get that version installed. A `npm install -g ember-cli` gets me 1.13.12 :confused:
<@U0N55UP19>: is that right after doing `ember new`, or have you added anything else to it?
Also, what version of node are you running?
Hmm, just did a fresh ember new deployment and error disappeared. Might just be a blip.
